content.text: Karndean LooseLay is an innovative new format of luxury vinyl flooring that's quick and easy to install. Featuring enhanced acoustic properties and excellent environmental credentials, Karndean LooseLay has been tried and tested in several markets worldwide, proving itself to be an ideal flooring system. Karndean LooseLay is faster and easier to install over most existing hard floors, it is suitable for raised access floors, requires no adhesives in most installations and is 100% recyclable.
